data.message: Fix pricing page card height alignment in Cinematch: Fixed by changing Card.tsx neon variant inner div from `h-full flex flex-col` to `flex-1 flex flex-col`. This allows the inner card body to grow and fill the parent flex container, ensuring all three pricing cards (Free, Pro, Studio) have equal height despite different feature counts. Verified with screenshot, committed and pushed to deploy.
